All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
BackGroundImage
For setting up the properties for home menu background image
Ball
For setting up the properties of a ball
Block
For setting up the properties of a block
Brick
For setting up the properties of a player
BrickCount
For getting and changing the value of brickCount
CementBrick
For setting up the properties of a cement brick
ClayBrick
For setting up the properties of a clay brick
DebugConsoleController
Responsible for creating the behaviours/logics for debug console's components
DebugConsoleView
The container for skip level button, reset ball button, ballXSpeed slider, ballYSpeed slider, and night mode radio button
ExitButton
For setting up the properties of exit button
GameBoard
The container for Wall and Debug Console and responsible for drawing components for wall, pause menu and high score board
GameFrame
The container for GameBoard,HomeMenuView, and InfoView.
GraphicsMain
The main class for the program.
HomeMenuController
Responsible for creating the behaviours/logics for home menu's components
HomeMenuView
The container for StartButton, ExitButton, InfoButton and BackGroundImage
ImpactManager
For handling all the logics that are related to the impact between ball, wall, paddle and brick
InfoButton
For setting up properties for info button
InfoController
Responsible for creating the behaviours/logics for info page's components
InfoImage
For setting up the properties for info image
InfoView
The container for OkButton and InfoImage
LevelManager
For handling all the logics that are related to levels
OkButton
For setting up properties for ok button
Paddle
For setting up the properties of a paddle
RubberBall
For setting up the properties of a rubber ball
Score
For getting and changing the value of score
ScoreList
Responsible for writing score into file and load the scores in order from the file to high score array list
StartButton
For setting up the properties of start button
SteelBrick
For setting up the properties of a steel brick
WallController
Responsible for creating the behaviours/logics for wall's components
WallView
Responsible for creating objects that are related to the game such as ball, bricks, paddle for GameBoard to draw
